text: La finta giardiniera is a 1774 opera by Pasquale Anfossi to a libretto by Giuseppe Petrosellini, not CalzabigiMozart's operas - Page 59 Rudolph Angermüller - 1988 - Breaking new ground A three-act dramma giocoso by Pasquale Anfossi La Finta Giardiniera, was first performed at Rome's Teatro delle Dame on December 26 (?), 1773. The libretto was probably by Abbate Giuseppe Petrosellini, Secretary to .., premiered at the Teatro delle Dame, Rome, for Carnival 1774. The opera by Mozart to the same libretto followed in Munich, 13 January 1775. ==Recording== *Nuria Rial (Sandrina), Krystian Adam (Count Belfiore), Maria Espada (Ramiro), Katja Stuber (Arminda), Miljenko Turk (Podestà), Florian Götz (Nardo), Monika Reinhard (Serpetta) L'Arte del Mondo, Werner Ehrhardt 3CD 2013 ==References== Category:1774 operas
title: La finta giardiniera (Anfossi)
